q: How many days does it take to dispatch the order?
a: We will dispatch as soon as possible. We will dispatch within two days.

q: Are you available in WhatsApp chat for any enquiry/order?
a: Yes, we are available in WhatsApp for customer's queries.

q: Shall we enquire about availability of any books/products that are not listed?
a: Yes, we are here to help you. Please reach us through Whatsapp.

q: Is customisation available on book journals?
a: Sorry, customisation is not available as of now.

q: Do you take bulk/ return gift orders?
a: Yes. Please provide your requirement and budget. We will let you know if that is feasible from our sidende.
